title: Did not receive the alpha client tester's summoner's icon
body: Did not receive the alpha client tester's summoner's icon

replies.body:
If you logged in during the Alpha, you should have received the icon. I'd recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look at what we can do.

Let me know if you have any questions.
